name: .GLV File Extension
summary: Learn about .GLV files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You should not attempt to open GLV files. Instead, the Garmin mobile app loads GLV files when you browse the MP4 videos they accompany within the app. Examples of Garmin apps that support GLV files include VIRB, Drive, and dÄ“zl (Android and iOS).
